synopsis.text: That's the intriguing tale of Keita, an ordinary high school student plagued by a seemingly endless streak of bad luck. Unbeknownst to him, his life is governed by an unseen force called Terra, a life-energy that determines one's fortune and is shared among three identical individuals known as Doppeliners. Keita's mundane existence takes a dramatic turn when he encounters Kuro, a mysterious girl with extraordinary abilities who introduces him to the hidden world of Terra Guardians. These guardians, residing in secluded sanctuaries called Pure Places, maintain the balance of Terra and safeguard the world from chaos. Reluctantly, Keita finds himself entangled in this secret world, forming a bond with Kuro that will forever alter his destiny. As the narrative unfolds, Keita discovers that his past is intertwined with the Doppeliner system more than he could ever imagine, leading to a thrilling adventure filled with danger, mystery, and self-discovery.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
